first_part.title: The Problem
problem: We live in a time where Nigeria is widely regarded as the entertainment hub of the continent. With our content rapidly travelling across the globe, we know there is no shortage of entertainment, on the other hand we don’t have many entertainment platforms that perfectly fuse entertainment and informative content.
Looking for a platform with a fine blend of entertainment and information?

third_part.title: Our Solution
text: MyDiamondTV, brings you exclusive range of content on Entertainment, Business, Technology, Lifestyle, Health and Fitness. New programmes, videos and skits are uploaded weekly/monthly on the platform where you can stream from anywhere in the world.
MyDiamondTv goes beyond entertainment, it is set to inform, educate and also invite you to share what you’ve got with the African family at large.

MyDiamondTv is a multimedia platform prides in entertaining, educating and informing its viewers by documenting Nigerian pop culture, fashion and beauty while keeping an eye on the business space as well.
